metadata.description: A collection of Claude skills: Lambdakit to bootstrap Lambdas, commit-message to create Git commit messages and zod, a Zod v4 validation specialist.

plugins.name: lambdakit-ts
plugins.description: TypeScript toolkit for bootstrapping AWS Lambda functions

plugins.name: zod
plugins.description: A Zod v4 validation specialist for implementing type-safe validation in TypeScript applications

plugins.name: commit-message
plugins.description: Git commit message plugin to create a git commit message
